Title: Mickey's Magical Christmas: Snowed in at the House of Mouse
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Music
Director: Tony Craig, Roberts Gannaway, Rick Calabash
Writer: Thomas Hart, Roberts Gannaway (story editor), Jess Winfield, Kevin Campbell (story editor), Thomas Hart, Kevin Campbell (story editor)
Actors: Carlos Alazraqui, Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo, Jeff Bennett
Plot: Mickey and all his friends hold their own Christmas party at the House of Mouse, after being snowed in.
